title: 3 bd 1 bath w/balconies, 2nd fl walk-up
posting_body: ['3 bedrooms, 1 full bath, kitchen, spacious livingroom + pantry and laundry room with washer and gas dryer (owner supplied) in unit, front and rear balconies, small outdoor area in rear for play and entertainment.', 'Hardwood floors, granite counters, forced hot air heating system.', 'Gas cooking.', '2nd floor walk up, in a triple decker home with friendly neighbors.', 'Walking distance to restaurants, library, shopping, salons, transportation, t-station, 15 min walk to Milton.', 'Good neighborhood.', 'Off street parking.', 'Pets will be considered.', 'Is having awesome landlords a plus?', 'haha', 'But seriously- We don’t abandon renters!!', 'Respect is mutual and the relationship reciprocal.', 'Something goes wrong we fix it promptly.', 'We are local.', 'We’re down to earth and would love to hear from you if you’re interested!', 'Scott & Christina', '$2,100/month.', 'Utilities not included.', 'Only serious inquiries please.', 'Do not solicit!']
